name: Appliance Repair Fredericksburg VA
tag_list: appliance-repair, washer-repair, dryer-repair, refrigerator-repair, fredericksburg-va, air-conditioning
overview: Appliance repair Pro’s technicians are factory trained to repair virtually any appliance in your home. With one call you can get your appliance repaired properly and efficiently. We stand behind every appliance repair. We give a full guarantee of 90 days in every part installed, and a free 30-day re-check service, if necessary, on any appliance repair we do. If you have an intermittent problem, it is sometimes difficult to understand the problem if the unit does not work when the technician is in your home. We offer a free check again, if necessary, on any appliance that we repair or diagnose the date of notification. We are proud of our work, because we care about our customers first, and then about the appliance. Our appliance repair technicians are factory trained. We specialize in all kitchen and laundry appliance repair and service.
